home.herosliderh4: the best of the land to you!
home.herotext1: Top quality products, chosen and approved by consumers who value the best of national production.
home.herotext2: Your trust is our greatest pride.
home.title: Quality fruit and vegetable products
home.desc: Frutas Patrícia Pilar is a 100% national company, created with the objective of supplying the national and international fruit and vegetable market, based on production, distribution and commercialisation.
home.specialitytext: High quality products available all year round and distributed nationally and internationally.

products.item1description1: It is characterised by its thin skin and firm pulp.
products.item1description2: It has a mild flavour and is known for its excellent freshness and ease of consumption.
products.item2description1: It is characterised by its thin skin and firm pulp.
products.item2description2: It has a mild flavour and is known for its excellent freshness and ease of consumption.
products.item3description1: It is characterised by its elongated shape and smooth skin.
products.item3description2: It has a delicate, creamy flavour and is known for its excellent freshness and ease of consumption.
products.item4description1: It is characterised by a dense, crunchy rind with light red tones and white flesh.
products.item4description2: It has a very sweet flavour with little acidity.

certificates.title: our certifications
certificates.description: Our Quality Department works continuously to implement various standards aimed at ensuring and guaranteeing food safety for the end consumer.

infrahome.title: Infrastructures
infrahome.text: With 45,000 square meters of covered surface, the company currently has one of the largest and most technological installations in the sector in the country.

production.heading: Own production:
production.text: We are proud to produce various products in different regions of the country, taking advantage of the characteristics of each soil and unique microclimates. Orgulhamo-nos de produzir diversos produtos em várias regiões do país, tirando proveito das características próprias de cada solo e micro-climas únicos.

empresa.bannertext: Frutas Patrícia Pilar is a family business belonging to the 2nd generation of agricultural entrepreneurs, a generation that started this activity in Lourinhã over 30 years ago.
empresa.historytext: Frutas Patrícia Pilar was founded in 1992 with the aim of supplying high quality fruit and vegetable products, establishing solid partnerships with national producers. Over the years, we have significantly expanded our storage and packaging capacity - a growth of more than 300% - which positions us today as a consolidated benchmark in the fruit and vegetable industry.
empresa.year1: Founding of the company in Lourinhã, focusing on the commercialisation of fruit and vegetable products.
empresa.year2: Move to Casais do Rijo, marking the start of expansion.
empresa.year3: New move to Vale da Borra, increasing operating capacity.
empresa.year4: New facilities in Paradas, consolidating growth and expansion in the sector.
empresa.year5: Head office in A-dos-Cunhados, Torres Vedras; continuous evolution and strengthening in the fruit and vegetable market.
empresa.propriatext: Tomatoes are our main product, accounting for around 70 per cent of our business and being the fastest growing item. In collaboration with our growers, we are the country's largest producer of tomatoes for fresh consumption, supplying all distribution channels. We also offer a variety of vegetables, such as sweet potatoes, carrots, pumpkins, green beans, Fuji, Royal Gala and Reineta apples, as well as the prestigious Pera Rocha.boniatos, zanahorias, calabazas, judías verdes, manzanas Fuji, Royal Gala y Reineta, así como la prestigiosa Pera Rocha.
empresa.linhastext: Conheça as nossas vertentes de atuação e o nosso compromisso Find out about our lines of action and our commitment to excellence.
empresa.card1para1: At Frutas Patrícia Pilar, quality starts with our land.
empresa.card1para2: With over 30 years' experience, we grow fresh fruit and vegetables with the greatest care and respect for nature.
empresa.card1para3: Our production processes are rigorous, guaranteeing healthy, tasty and pesticide-free food.
empresa.card1para4: We work with cutting-edge technologies and sustainable practices to bring you the best of our harvest.
empresa.card2para1: Our commitment goes far beyond delivery: we always strive to create lasting partnerships with our customers.
empresa.card2para2: Frutas Patrícia Pilar is a benchmark in the marketing of high-quality fruit and vegetables, offering personalised solutions and specialised service.
empresa.card2para3: For over 30 years, we have been synonymous with trust, quality and excellence in the fruit and vegetable industry.
empresa.card3para1: The excellence of our products goes beyond production.
empresa.card3para2: With efficient and agile logistics, we ensure that our products reach our customers fresh and at the right time.
empresa.card3para3: With decades of experience in the market, we understand the importance of punctuality and quality in delivery, earning the trust of our customers.
empresa.lileotext: Our auction establishes a direct connection between production and traditional trade, with partnerships based on quality, food safety and alignment with our product range. We guarantee stability in supply and effective solutions for disposal, ensuring a continuous supply of the most demanded products and complementing production with installed commercial capacity. Our distribution channels allow us to sell our production capacity under fair and competitive conditions, so that producers can concentrate on the excellence of their production while we take care of the commercialisation effectively.
empresa.infratext1: Currently with 24 loading and unloading docks, they allow for constant operationalisation and dynamics in the picking up and delivering of products 24 hours a day.
empresa.infratext2: Capacity for more than 2000 tonnes of storage in a space of almost 5000 m2. This guarantees quality product management and freshness.
empresa.infratext3: We have a refrigerated storage capacity of up to 10,000 tonnes of products, kept in a controlled atmosphere, guaranteeing the freshness and quality of the products.
empresa.infratext4: The packing area has a capacity for 300 employees, who prepare 600 tonnes/day. With 14 high-tech production lines for various fruits and vegetables, including flowpack, retractable and bag machines.

productos.text: We offer a diverse range of high-quality products, available all year round and with guaranteed distribution on the national and international markets.

producao.producaotext: We pride ourselves on producing a wide range of products in different regions of Portugal, making the most of each territory's particularities. The diversity of soils and unique microclimates from north to south allow us to cultivate with excellence, respecting the rhythm of nature and valuing the best that each region has to offer. This approach guarantees authentic products with their own identity and reinforces our commitment to national, sustainable and quality production.
producao.propiatext1: Located between the Montejunto, Aires and Candeeiros mountains, the Oeste region is favoured by a number of characteristics that make its ecosystems unique in Portugal.
producao.propiatext2: The balance between the sea breeze and the constant temperature throughout the year makes this one of the best areas in Europe for agriculture.
producao.qualidadetext: Our Quality Department works continuously to implement various standards aimed at ensuring and guaranteeing food safety for the final consumer. From the supplier selection process, through the technical monitoring of the crops in the field, guaranteeing the best preservation of the products in our centre and ending with a selection of the best products that reach the consumer on a daily basis, with the best freshness and quality.
producao.sustentabilidadetext: At Frutas Patrícia Pilar, we are committed to adopting more sustainable practices, promoting balance with the environment through the conscious choice of materials. At the same time, we invest in the company's internal culture, encouraging the whole team to adopt a responsible attitude in line with these values. We believe that environmental responsibility should be seen as an act of conscience, not just an obligation. As a reflection of this commitment, we are ISO 14001 certified and associated with GRACE–Empresas Responsáveis, reinforcing our dedication to sustainability and continuous improvement.

marcas.text1: Grupo Patrícia Pilar brings together complementary brands that, collectively, ensure a comprehensive response to market demands, reinforcing the group’s position as a benchmark in the sector.
marcas.text2: With a strategy focused on expansion and collaboration, Grupo Patrícia Pilar has been strengthening its presence in the sector, ensuring competitiveness and the ability to meet market demands.
marcas.mg1desc1: The premium tomato brand with intense flavor and texture.
marcas.mg1desc2: The Crush brand is synonymous with the best tomatoes produced in Portugal. Developed to the highest quality standards, Crush brings a product of excellence to the consumer every day.
marcas.mg1story: Born with the aim of providing consumers with the experience of consuming the best tomatoes produced in Portugal, Crush operates with the most sophisticated means of production and quality control, established in the west of the country. One of the most important and rich areas of our country where the climate and ecosystem come together to create one of the best places in Europe for tomato production. Crush produces various types of tomato, achieving a supply that covers almost the entire year.
marcas.mg2desc2: Westfarm is a brand dedicated to varieties of premium products. Extra quality, freshness and presentation are its characteristics.
marcas.mg2story: Westfarm was created to bring to the market the best of what is produced in Portugal. All these products have superior quality control and are brought to the consumer every day.
marcas.mg2story2: All sourced from national cultures, they are the result of attention and professionalism to detail, resulting in a unique range of premium articles for national and international consumption.
marcas.mg3desc1: One of the most successful and popular tomato brands on the market.
marcas.mg3desc2: A brand of selected tomatoes, produced entirely in Portugal, with more notoriety in today's market.
marcas.mg3story: Mr. Red, a brand that brings various types of quality selected tomatoes to the consumer. Supplying the most important distribution chains, Mr. Red is able to be present 365 days a year, bringing 1,000,000 tonnes of tomatoes to the consumer every year.
marcas.mg4desc2: LuxNuts is a premium nut brand, where raw materials are selected through rigorous quality control.
marcas.mg4story: Created to enter the high-end nut market, LuxNuts is part of Grupo Patrícia Pilar and offers a wide product catalogue.
marcas.mg4story2: Salted or unsalted, LuxNuts products undergo strict quality processes to ensure exceptional standards. From shelled or unshelled peanuts to roasted Californian almonds in shell, LuxNuts delivers excellence tailored to the most demanding Iberian consumers.
marcas.mg5desc1: All kinds of quality products at the best price.
marcas.mg5desc2: Quality at the best price can only come from Dodu. One of the most competitive and aggressive brands in the fruit and vegetable market.
marcas.mg5story: The Dodu brand stands out from the competition due to its great aggressiveness and quality/price balance, managing to be distributed nationally and internationally quickly and efficiently
marcas.mg5story2: Dodu offers a wide range of nationally produced products at the best price, without compromising the freshness and quality of the product.
marcas.mg6desc1: The best fruit and vegetable products at the best prices.
marcas.mg6desc2: The brand brings the consumer the best product at the lowest price.
marcas.mg6story: Quintas do Atlântico is a fruit and vegetable brand that aims to offer the market a very competitive product in terms of price.
marcas.mg6story2: Produced almost entirely in the West region, all of the brand's fruit and vegetables manage to maintain a quality/price ratio above the market, offering a range of products 365 days a year.
marcas.mg7desc1: Wines that celebrate tradition, passion and authenticity.
marcas.mg7desc2: Family, Love and Soul - the pillars that define the Madame Pilar brand.
marcas.mg7story: Producing wines from the Lisbon region, the brand celebrates tradition, passion and authenticity. Inspired by the family spirit and dedication to the art of winemaking, each bottle reflects a commitment to quality and essence. With the slogan Family, Love and Soul, its wines are more than a sensory experience - they are a toast to the moments that really matter.
marcas.eg1desc1: Group with +25 companies in national and international markets.
marcas.eg1desc2: The Grupo Patrícia Pilar is a consolidated business group with more than 25 companies in various areas of activity.
marcas.eg1story: Since its foundation, the Group has excelled in the production and commercialisation of fruit and vegetables, as well as in sectors such as transport, logistics, energy, technology, food retail and consultancy.
marcas.eg1story2: With a significant presence in Portugal and Spain, the Group is strengthening its international position, with 40 per cent of its turnover coming from exports, including strategic markets such as Spain, France, Morocco and Brazil.
marcas.eg2desc1: Company specialized in road freight transport.
marcas.eg2desc2: Company specialized in road freight transport, with a focus on the fresh produce sector.
marcas.eg2story: Founded in 2016 and operating since 2011, it ensures the distribution of fresh fruit and vegetables across Portugal, Spain and international markets. With a fleet of over 50 refrigerated vehicles, the company guarantees full traceability and strict cold chain control, serving destinations such as France, Germany, Belgium and Poland.
marcas.eg3desc1: Fresh tomato producer with national and international distribution.
marcas.eg3desc2: Directly from Portugal’s West region to the world.
marcas.eg3story: With strong expertise in large-scale tomato trading, the company was founded in 2019 and quickly stood out for the freshness and quality of its products. Through advanced technologies such as drip irrigation and climate control systems, it ensures consistency and excellence in every fruit.
marcas.eg3story2: Committed to continuous supply, the company delivers fresh products tailored to the demands of both national and international markets, establishing itself as a reliable and trusted partner.
marcas.eg4desc1: Fruit and vegetable retail spaces in the northern region of the country.
marcas.eg4desc2: A family business based in Estarreja that sells fruit, vegetables and other food products.
marcas.eg4story: Since 2014, Frutas Monte Cristo has established itself as a leading name in fruit and vegetable distribution in Portugal. Based in Estarreja, the company currently operates 14 shops and 7 wholesale outlets from north to south of Portugal, serving customers of different sizes and sectors.
marcas.eg4story2: With efficient operations and a specialised team, it guarantees freshness, quality and proximity in every delivery, responding professionally to the demands of national and international customers.
marcas.eg5desc1: Import and export of premium exotic fruits.
marcas.eg5desc2: Vintage Fruit is dedicated to the supply and distribution of exotic varieties such as mango, papaya, avocado and passion fruit, with a special focus on imports from South America.
marcas.eg5story: Located in a strategic region, the company ensures an agile and controlled supply chain, guaranteeing freshness, quality and continuous availability throughout the year.
marcas.eg6desc1: Wholesale outlet located at MARL, daily supplier in Lisbon.
marcas.eg6desc2: Located in MARL - Mercado Abastecedor da Região de Lisboa, Dolce Fruta specialises in the wholesale of fruit and vegetables, standing out for the quality, freshness and diversity of its products.
marcas.eg6story: With operations ranging from large supermarkets to local shops, the company is recognised for its ability to respond to market demands and for its close relationship with producers.
marcas.eg6story2: Committed to offering top quality products, Dolce Fruta ensures efficiency and transparency in all processes, with a focus on customer and consumer satisfaction.
marcas.eg7desc1: Producer of peaches, nectarines, and flat peaches.
marcas.eg7desc2: Specialising in the production of premium quality fruit, Verdimparável combines tradition and innovation to deliver the best to its customers.
marcas.eg7story: The company is located in the Central Alentejo sub-region and is dedicated to growing peaches, nectarines and Paraguayan peaches. Benefiting from ideal climatic and soil conditions, the company ensures fresh, tasty and visually appealing fruit, standing out in the premium segment of national fruit growing.
marcas.eg7story2: Combining sustainable agricultural practices with careful harvesting, Verdimparável aims to provide its customers with an exceptional quality experience, guaranteeing their total satisfaction.
marcas.eg8desc1: Dedicated to the production and marketing of fruit and vegetables.
marcas.eg8desc2: Hortoriba sets rigorous standards at every stage of production, guaranteeing the satisfaction of its customers and the excellence of its products.
marcas.eg8story: A company specialising in the wholesale of fruit and vegetable products, it offers an integrated solution, including processing, packaging, conservation and distribution.
marcas.eg8story2: With a strong commitment to operational efficiency and food safety, it offers fresh products of controlled origin and high quality.
marcas.eg9desc1: A leading name in wholesale fruit and produce trade.
marcas.eg9desc2: With over 30 years' experience in fruit and vegetable wholesaling, Lapifrutas specialises in the production of apples, pears and cherries, in close collaboration with around 30 local producers.
marcas.eg9story: The company produces around 5,000 tonnes of fruit a year, with a constant focus on quality and freshness. Certified to ISO 9001 and ISO 22000 standards, it carries out rigorous controls at every stage of the process, from selection to distribution, guaranteeing traceability and a firm commitment to environmental sustainability.
marcas.eg10desc1: Agricultural company specialized in apple production.
marcas.eg10desc2: Agricultural company specialising in the production of high-quality apples.
marcas.eg10story: With an approach focused on sustainability and innovation, the company adopts integrated production practices that guarantee maximum respect for the environment, while ensuring the freshness and excellence of its products.
marcas.eg10story2: Pommeideias has been expanding its cultivation area, consolidating its position as a benchmark in Portuguese fruit growing.
marcas.eg11desc1: Iberian company dedicated to the trade of fresh fruit and vegetables.
marcas.eg11desc2: An Iberian company dedicated to the commercialisation of fresh fruit and vegetables, the result of a collaboration between Portuguese and Spanish entrepreneurs.
marcas.eg11story: With a focus on quality and freshness, the company stands out for offering products from the Axarquía region in Malaga and for importing fruit and vegetables from northern Morocco.
marcas.eg11story2: Rico Tomé & Patrícia Pilar ensures a continuous and efficient supply to European markets, offering optimised logistics solutions and products that meet the requirements of distributors and retailers.
marcas.eg12desc1: Company dedicated to the production of tomatoes and zucchini in the west region.
marcas.eg12desc2: With a 3.3 hectare farm, it grows 4 varieties of tomato (rama, salad, chucha and coração de boi) and courgette, producing around 500 tonnes of tomato and 300 tonnes of courgette every year.
marcas.eg12story: The company stands out for its strict quality control, the result of efficient management and responsible agricultural practices, and has established itself as a major player in the Portuguese fruit and vegetable sector.
marcas.eg13desc1: Dedicated to the production of apples and Rocha pears.
marcas.eg13desc2: Company dedicated to the exclusive exploitation of apple and rock pear orchards, located in the Oeste sub-region.
marcas.eg13story: Starting operations in 2019, the company benefits from ideal climatic and soil conditions for excellent fruit growing. Adopting good agricultural practices and strict quality control, from the orchard to the consumer, Maçã Encantada guarantees premium fruit with intense flavour and superior freshness, consolidating its position as a benchmark in the production of quality apples and pears.
marcas.eg14desc1: Company dedicated to the wholesale trade of fruit and fresh produce.
marcas.eg14desc2: A company dedicated to the wholesale of fruit and vegetables.
marcas.eg14story: A company specialising in the wholesale trade of fruit and vegetables, based in San Isidro, Alicante, focusing on the import, export and distribution of fruit and vegetable products, serving both the wholesale and specialised retail markets.
marcas.eg14story2: With a flexible, customer-orientated business model, it acts as a reliable link between international producers and local markets, providing reception, selection and logistics services, with professional certification in the cold chain, guaranteeing product freshness and quality.
marcas.eg15desc1: Production and distribution of fruit and vegetables.
marcas.eg15desc2: With over three decades of experience, Frutas AZ is a Spanish company specialising in the production, selection and distribution of fresh fruit and vegetables.
marcas.eg15story: The company operates throughout Spain, with strategic logistics centres in Aragon and Extremadura and main facilities in Mercamadrid.
marcas.eg15story2: Focused on sustainability and the use of indigenous varieties, Frutas AZ guarantees the quality and flavour of its products through rigorous control, from cultivation to the point of sale, adapting to the demands of the modern consumer.
marcas.eg16desc1: Digital marketing agency offering design and communication solutions.
marcas.eg16desc2: Creative digital agency offering a wide range of services in the areas of communication, design and technology.
marcas.eg16story: It develops integrated solutions, from social media management, branding and audiovisual production to the development of customised websites and software. With a multidisciplinary team, Devtech focuses on creating personalised, functional and visually impactful projects, positioning itself as a strategic partner in the digital transformation of brands and businesses.
marcas.eg17desc1: Quality and innovation in the real estate and construction sectors.
marcas.eg17desc2: It operates in the construction and property sector, offering services that include buying and selling property, construction, renting and real estate brokerage.
marcas.eg17story: With an approach that combines innovation, quality and rigour, the company is dedicated to property refurbishment and condominium management. Committed to excellence, Sociedade Imobiliária Carmona guarantees technical support and integrated solutions from project to delivery, serving both private clients and corporate entities.
marcas.eg18desc1: Consulting company specialized in the management and commercialization of electricity and natural gas.
marcas.eg18desc2: A consultancy firm specialising in the management and sale of electricity and natural gas.
marcas.eg18story: With over a decade of experience, it offers personalised solutions for companies and consumers, focusing on energy efficiency and cost reduction.
marcas.eg18story2: The company is recognised for its transparency, innovation and commitment to sustainability, promoting a more autonomous and responsible energy future.
marcas.eg19desc1: Company dedicated to the production, bottling, and marketing of wines and liqueur beverages.
marcas.eg19desc2: A company dedicated to the production, bottling and commercialisation of wines and liqueur drinks.
marcas.eg19story: With an integrated operating model that covers all stages of the value chain, from winemaking to distribution, the company is committed to combining tradition and innovation.
marcas.eg19story2: Aimed at the national and international markets, it offers a range of wines that reflect the richness of Portuguese soils.

distribuicao.title: Lloretrans fleet
distribuicao.text: With a high-capacity inland transport infrastructure, it ensures the delivery of the exceptional freshness and quality of our products.
distribuicao.intro: Lloretrans is a company specialising in the transport of products by road, with a focus on the fruit and vegetable sector. With a fleet of more than 50 vehicles, equipped with refrigerated trailers and real-time monitoring systems, it ensures that the quality and freshness of the products is maintained throughout transport.
distribuicao.card1text1: It offers safe and fast national and international transport with a fleet of refrigerated lorries equipped with advanced technology.
distribuicao.card1text2: Customers are informed of the status of their parcel.
distribuicao.card2text1: Safe and fast national and international transport with a focus on the Iberian market, also operating in other European countries and Morocco.
distribuicao.card2text2: It has a fleet of refrigerated trailers equipped with advanced technology.

contactos.emailtext: Send us an email with your question and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactos.phonetext: Call us if you need an immediate response.
contactos.locationtext: We are available to welcome you at our facilities.
contactos.formsubtitle2: Your message will be answered as soon as possible.
contactos.sucessmsg: Obrigado! A sua mensagem foi enviada com sucesso.
contactos.name: Name
contactos.subject: Subject
contactos.teamformtext: We are always looking for exceptional talent to join our team and contribute to our continued success.
contactos.supportedformat: Supported formats: PDF, TXT, WORD DOC

recruitment.text1: Contacte-nos se tiver qualquer dúvida sobre a nossa empresa.
recruitment.text2: Iremos responder-lhe o mais brevemente possível.

privacypolicy.clause1p1: As part of its service provision, Frutas Patricia Pilar SA regularly needs to collect certain personal data from its clients, suppliers, and website users, such as name, email address, and physical address, among other examples.
privacypolicy.clause1p2: Additionally, interactions by the Data Subject through our websites, newsletters, or social media may also require the collection of personal information, either to enable services provided by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA or, in other cases, to improve application performance through data collected from the user’s device via small files commonly known as cookies.
privacypolicy.clause1p3: This Privacy and Personal Data Processing Statement helps you understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our services or visit our websites.
privacypolicy.clause1p4: You may request further information or clarification regarding this Privacy and Personal Data Processing Statement by contacting:
privacypolicy.addressp5: or to the e-mail address: rgpd@patriciapilar.pt
privacypolicy.clause2title: Privacy and Personal Data Processing Statement
privacypolicy.clause2p1: Frutas Patricia Pilar SA is committed to protecting the privacy of Data Subjects when using its products and services, and to developing technology that ensures the best and safest online experiences.
privacypolicy.clause2p2: Data Subjects may browse most of Frutas Patricia Pilar SA’s websites without providing personal information. However, in some cases, such information is required to deliver requested services.
privacypolicy.clause2p3: This Privacy and Personal Data Processing Statement helps you understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit our websites or use our products and services.
privacypolicy.clause2p4: By providing your personal data to Frutas Patricia Pilar SA, you acknowledge and consent to its processing in accordance with this Statement and the terms and conditions of the services used. Consent is given freely, specifically, informed, and unequivocally by the Data Subject. Accordingly, and regarding personal data processing, the Data Subject should read this Statement together with the Terms and Conditions governing the various products and services offered by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA. Should Frutas Patricia Pilar SA make any changes to this Statement, such changes will be posted on this page so you can review the type of information we collect and how we use it.
privacypolicy.deftext: Personal Data refers to any information, regardless of its format, including sound and image, related to an identified or identifiable individual (Data Subject). An individual is considered identifiable if they can be identified directly or indirectly, particularly through reference to an identification number or other specific elements of their physical, physiological, psychological, economic, cultural, or social identity.
privacypolicy.data1: What data is collected and generated by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA’s network or systems?
privacypolicy.data1text1: In the course of providing contracted services, Frutas Patricia Pilar SA will necessarily have access to confidential information, including member data, user personal data, articles, documents, multimedia files, among others.
privacypolicy.data1text2: This data is processed automatically, in compliance with applicable legislation and the conditions defined by the Comissão Nacional de Proteção de Dados (CNPD).
privacypolicy.data1text3: Frutas Patricia Pilar SA declares that any Personal Data accessed during service provision will be used solely in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and Council of 27 April 2016, concerning the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the free movement of such data, which repeals Diretiva 95/46/EC (Regulamento Geral sobre a Proteção de Dados).
privacypolicy.data2: When is personal data collected and generated?
privacypolicy.data2text1: In general, personal data is requested when the Data Subject subscribes to one of our products or services.
privacypolicy.data2text2: Frutas Patricia Pilar SA respects your right to privacy and does not collect any personal information without your prior consent.
privacypolicy.data2text3: Some personal data is mandatory for service provision. Frutas Patricia Pilar SA will inform you of this requirement, and in the event of missing or incorrect data, the company may be unable to provide the contracted service. The provision of incorrect or inaccurate data is the sole responsibility of the Data Subject.
privacypolicy.data3: What is the purpose of collecting personal data?
privacypolicy.data3text1: Generally, personal data collected from the Data Subject is used for service provision and billing, management and evaluation of the contractual relationship, service customization, payment processing, and for information, marketing or telemarketing activities by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA, its associated companies or group entities, and third parties. It may also be used to include the Data Subject in subscriber lists.
privacypolicy.data3text2: Your personal data will also be processed to respond to your questions, suggestions, or complaints.
privacypolicy.data4: Who is responsible for personal data processing?
privacypolicy.data4text1: The data controller is Frutas Patricia Pilar SA.
privacypolicy.clause3title: Subcontractors, Disclosure, and Transfer of Personal Data
privacypolicy.clause3p1: Personal data may be disclosed to courts and other competent authorities, strictly in accordance with legal requirements, particularly when necessary for resolving billing disputes or for activities related to public safety, national defense and security, and the prevention, investigation, and detection of criminal offenses.
privacypolicy.clause3p2: Frutas Patricia Pilar SA may also engage subcontractors for all or part of the purposes mentioned above, as well as for the maintenance, hosting, and management of its systems and IT equipment, in accordance with applicable data protection legislation.
privacypolicy.data5: How long will personal data be kept?
privacypolicy.data5text: Your personal data is retained only for the duration necessary to provide the service or product, or to comply with Frutas Patricia Pilar SA’s legal obligations.
privacypolicy.cookies1p1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, mobile phone) via your internet browser. They are commonly used to retain information about your website visit across multiple sessions (e.g., preferences, pages visited, etc.).
privacypolicy.cookies1p2: Cookies are used by most websites to enhance the user experience.
privacypolicy.cookies2: What types of Cookies are used on Frutas Patricia Pilar SA websites?
privacypolicy.cookies2text1: Enable navigation and use of applications and services provided by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA, such as access to secure areas of the site. Without these cookies, services cannot be provided.
privacypolicy.cookies2text2: Collect aggregated data for statistical analysis and site improvement.
privacypolicy.cookies2text3: Allow for easy and personalized navigation by storing user preferences, so they don’t need to be reconfigured on each visit.
privacypolicy.cookies2text4: Some pages on Frutas Patricia Pilar SA websites include components provided by third parties (e.g., YouTube videos, social media) that use cookies independent of those managed by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA.
privacypolicy.cookies2text5: Enable targeted advertising based on each user’s interests, by collecting browsing habits. This ensures that the ads shown are relevant to your needs.
privacypolicy.cookies2text: Some cookies are deleted automatically when the browser session ends (“session cookies”), while others remain on your device and allow it to be identified on your next visit (“persistent cookies”).
privacypolicy.cookies3: How can you block the use of Cookies?
privacypolicy.cookies3text: Your browser allows you to manage cookie settings, including blocking all cookies from Frutas Patricia Pilar SA. However, blocking cookies may affect your user experience.
privacypolicy.cookies4: Who can access the information collected by Cookies?
privacypolicy.cookies4text: The information collected may be used by Frutas Patricia Pilar SA, its subcontractors, or partners.
privacypolicy.clause5p1: To inform the Data Subject about new products and services, Frutas Patricia Pilar SA may use the following methods: mail, phone, email, SMS, MMS, or any other electronic communication service, with the Data Subject’s express consent.
privacypolicy.clause5p2: Consent may be withdrawn at any time by contacting:
privacypolicy.clause6subtitle: Right to access, correction, objection, and deletion of personal data
privacypolicy.clause6p1: Under applicable law, the Data Subject has the right to access their personal data and may request its correction or update by contacting Frutas Patricia Pilar SA.
privacypolicy.clause6p2: The Data Subject may also, at any time, object to the processing of their data, except for data strictly necessary for service provision, and/or request deletion of their data for marketing, telemarketing, or inclusion in subscriber lists and information services, by contacting Frutas Patricia Pilar SA in writing or via email:
privacypolicy.clause7p1: Ensuring the confidentiality and security of personal data is a constant concern for Frutas Patricia Pilar SA. Recognizing the sensitivity of this information, the company has developed and shared Privacy and Data Security Policies with all employees.
privacypolicy.clause7p2: TEmployees and service providers of Frutas Patricia Pilar SA are committed to not disclosing or using personal data for unlawful purposes, and only within the scope of their professional duties.
privacypolicy.clause7p3: Frutas Patricia Pilar SA has systems and teams in place to ensure data security, creating and updating procedures to prevent unauthorized access, accidental loss, or destruction of personal data.
privacypolicy.clause7p4: The company is committed to complying with data privacy legislation and to processing personal data only for the purposes for which it was collected, ensuring appropriate levels of security and confidentiality in accordance with applicable law and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacypolicy.clause7p5: To ensure the security of its services and network, Frutas Patricia Pilar SA reserves the right to monitor performance and quality, detect technical failures, transmission errors, threats, spam, viruses, hacking, and other security vulnerabilities, without, however, exercising human control over the content transmitted through its network.
privacypolicy.clause7p6: Although Frutas Patricia Pilar SA has implemented security measures for receiving data via the internet, it is important to note that data transmitted online is not fully protected against potential interception. The transmission of access credentials, passwords, confidential codes, or any sensitive information is the sole responsibility of the Data Subject.
privacypolicy.clause7p7: During website sessions, cookies are used and expire when the browser is closed. Their use facilitates communication and service delivery. Most browsers allow the Data Subject to choose whether to accept cookies, and they may refuse them if desired.
privacypolicy.clause7p8: For security purposes, all actions and operations performed on Frutas Patricia Pilar SA websites are logged.
privacypolicy.clause7p9: You may request confidentiality of your data and withdraw consent for its inclusion in telephone directories or information services of Frutas Patricia Pilar SA or third parties at any time by contacting the company.
privacypolicy.clause8text: The Data Subject has the right to file a complaint with the supervisory authority.
